name: viriback-c2-tracker-feed
label: ViriBack C2 Tracker Feed
description:
ViriBack C2 Tracker is a C2 Tracker platform that instantly monitors current cyber threats. ViriBack C2 Tracker tracks malware activity and provides the URLs of the most recently detected Command and Control (C2) panels and the malware used on these panels. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list indicators.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the ViriBack C2 Tracker server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the ViriBack C2 Tracker server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from ViriBack C2 Tracker Feed.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.value: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose from following options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR: Specify the IRI of the Record Creation Playbook in Record Creation Playbook IRI field. Return as a JSON: Select this option to receive feeds as a JSON object.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Record Creation Playbook IRI
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description: Specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR™ in the Record Creation Playbook IRI field.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: create_pb_id
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.tooltip: Specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR™ in the Record Creation Playbook IRI field.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Confidence
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: confidence
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.tooltip: Specify the confidence score to be set for the feeds. Specify the range between 0 to 100. By default, this option is set to 90.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description: Specify the confidence score to be set for the feeds. Specify the range between 0 to 100. By default, this option is set to 90.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Reputation
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: reputation
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.tooltip: Select the reputation to be set for the feeds. By default, this option is set to "Good"
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description:
Select the reputation to be set for the feeds. You can choose from the following options:  
Good, Suspicious, Malicious, No Reputation Available, TBD.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: TLP
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: tlp
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.tooltip: Select the TLP to be set for the feeds. By default, this option is set to "White"
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description:
Select the TLP to be set for the feeds. You can choose from the following options:  
Red, Amber, Green, White.
